Name: Snow Wars
About the game: As it turned out, snowmen are not so defenseless. Breaking them, people did not even think that they also have a soul, a desire to live and, of course, a desire to take revenge on people. Not an easy path for our hero, to hold out until spring and melt in a natural way. Don't break the snowmen! Snow Wars is a dynamic shooter that brings out your primal instinct for self-preservation. Use your skills wisely and try to hold out as long as possible. Music and beautiful visual style will accompany you throughout the game. Game features: - Beautiful Pixel - Art - Dynamic Music - Lots of Levels - Hardcore
